body_html: I'm not sure this is worth adding. Can't you just pass -value to minimize? Having a separate function is a nontrivial cognitive burden since Optimizer is part of a class hierarchy. For example, your current implementation is wrong, since if someone overrides minimize to do something new maximize will no longer do the right thing for that derived class.

body: I'm not sure this is worth adding.  Can't you just pass `-value` to `minimize`?  Having a separate function is a nontrivial cognitive burden since `Optimizer` is part of a class hierarchy.  For example, your current implementation is wrong, since if someone overrides `minimize` to do something new `maximize` will no longer do the right thing for that derived class.
